00040 PathPlanner::PathPlanner(Robot *rob,Map * map_in,double dG,double bridge_len,
00041                         double bridge_r,double reg_g,double reg_conn_rad,double obst_pen,double bridge_conn_rad_in):
00042                         Astar(rob,dG),
00043                         obstacle_radius(rob->getExpansionRadius()),
00044                         bridge_length(bridge_len),
00045                         bridge_res(bridge_r),
00046                         regGridDist(reg_g),
00047                         reg_grid_conn_rad(reg_conn_rad),
00048                         obst_dist(obst_pen),
00049                         bridge_conn_rad(bridge_conn_rad_in)
00050 {
00051         printf("\n-> Starting Planner."); fflush(stdout);
00052         this->setMap(map_in);   
00053         printf("\n\tPlanning Parameters:"); fflush(stdout);
00054         printf("\n\t\t\t Pixel Resolution = %f",map->getMapRes());fflush(stdout); 
00055         printf("\n\t\t\t Distance to Goal = %f",dG); fflush(stdout);
00056         printf("\n\t\t\t Bridge Test Lenght = %f",bridge_len); fflush(stdout);
00057         printf("\n\t\t\t Bridge Test Res = %f",bridge_res); fflush(stdout);
00058         printf("\n\t\t\t Reg Grid Res  = %f",reg_g); fflush(stdout);
00059         printf("\n\t\t\t Obstacle Expansion Radius = %f",obstacle_radius);fflush(stdout);         
00060         printf("\n\t\t\t Reg Connection Radius = %f",reg_grid_conn_rad);fflush(stdout);
00061         printf("\n\t\t\t Bridge Connection Radius = %f",bridge_conn_rad);fflush(stdout);
00062         printf("\n\t\t\t Obstacle Penalty = %f",obst_pen);      fflush(stdout);
00063 };

00074 void PathPlanner::freeResources()
00075 {
00076         freeSearchSpace();
00077         freePath();
00078         root=NULL;
00079 }
00081 void PathPlanner::freePath()
00082 {
00083         Node *p;
00084         while(path != NULL) 
00085         {
00086                 p = path->next;
00087                 delete path;
00088                 path = p;
00089         }
00090 };

00163 void PathPlanner::expandObstacles()
00164 {
00165         if(!mapInitialized)
00166         {
00167                 printf("\n      --->>> You have to read the map before Expanding the Obstacles <<<---   ");fflush(stdout);
00168                 return;
00169         }
00170         int thickness;
00171         int m,n,x,y,radius;
00172         thickness = int(this->obstacle_radius/map->getMapRes());
00173         radius =2; // This covers vertical, horizontal and diagonal cells
00174         Map temp_map(map->getWidth(),map->getHeight(),map->getMapRes(),map->getNegate());
00175         for(int i = 0;i<map->getWidth();i++)
00176                 for(int j = 0;j<map->getHeight();j++)
00177                 {
00178                         temp_map.grid[i][j] = map->grid[i][j];
00179                 }
00180         for(int i=0;i<this->map->getWidth() - 1;i++)
00181                 for(int j=0;j<this->map->getHeight() - 1 ;j++)
00182                 {
00183                         for(x = (i - radius) ; x <= (i + radius) ; x ++)
00184                         {
00185                                 if (x < 0) x = 0;
00186                                 if (x >= this->map->getWidth())  break;
00187                                 y = (int)(- sqrt(radius*radius - (x - i)*(x - i)) + j);
00188                                 if (y < 0) y = 0;
00189                                 if (y >= this->map->getHeight()) y = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00190                                 if (temp_map.grid[i][j] && !temp_map.grid[x][y])
00191                                 {
00192                                 for (int r = 1; r <(int)(thickness);r++)
00193                                         for( m = (int)(i - r); m <= (int)(i + r);m++)
00194                                         {
00195                                                 if (m < 0) m = 0;
00196                                                 if (m >= this->map->getWidth())  break;
00197                                                 n = (int)(- sqrt(r*r - (m - i)*(m - i)) + j);
00198                                                 if (n < 0) n = 0;
00199                                                 if (n >= this->map->getHeight()) n = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00200                                                 this->map->grid[m][n] = true;
00201                                                 n = (int)(+ sqrt(r*r - (m - i)*(m - i)) + j);
00202                                                 if (n < 0) n = 0;
00203                                                 if (n >= this->map->getHeight()) n = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00204                                                 this->map->grid[m][n] = true;
00205                                         }
00206                                 break;
00207                                 }
00208                                 y = (int)(+ sqrt(radius*radius - (x - i)*(x - i)) + j);
00209                                 if (y < 0) y = 0;
00210                                 if (y >= this->map->getHeight()) y = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00211                                 if (temp_map.grid[i][j] && !temp_map.grid[x][y])
00212                                 {
00213                                 for (int r = 1; r <(int)(thickness);r++)
00214                                         for( m = (int)(i - r); m <= (int)(i + r);m++)
00215                                         {
00216                                                 if (m < 0) m = 0;
00217                                                 if (m >= this->map->getWidth())  break;
00218                                                 n = (int)(- sqrt(r*r - (m - i)*(m - i)) + j);
00219                                                 if (n < 0) n = 0;
00220                                                 if (n >= this->map->getHeight()) n = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00221                                                 this->map->grid[m][n] = true;
00222                                                 n = (int)(+ sqrt(r*r - (m - i)*(m - i)) + j);
00223                                                 if (n < 0) n = 0;
00224                                                 if (n >= this->map->getHeight()) n = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00225                                                 this->map->grid[m][n] = true;
00226                                         }
00227                                 break;
00228                                 }
00229                         }
00230                 }
00231         printf("\n      --->>> OBSTACLES EXPANDED SUCCESSFULLY <<<---   "); fflush(stdout);
00232         //ShowConnections();
00233 };
00235 bool PathPlanner::readSpaceFromFile(const char *filename)
00236 {
00237         double locationx,locationy,obstacle_cost;
00238         int type;
00239         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00240         assert(filename != NULL);
00241         filename = strdup(filename);
00242         FILE *file = fopen(filename, "r");
00243         if (!file)
00244         {
00245                 printf("Error Opening File");fflush(stdout);
00246         fclose(file);
00247         return false;
00248         }
00249         while (!feof(file))
00250         {
00251                 fscanf(file,"%lf %lf %lf %d\n",&locationx,&locationy,&obstacle_cost,&type);
00252                 if (searchSpace == NULL ) // Constructing the ROOT NODE
00253                 {
00254                         temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00255                         temp->location.setX(locationx);
00256                         temp->location.setY(locationy);
00257                         temp->obstacle_cost = obstacle_cost;
00258                         temp->parent   = NULL;
00259                         temp->next     = NULL;
00260                         temp->type     = type;
00261                         searchSpace = temp;
00262                 }
00263                 else
00264                 {
00265                         temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00266                         temp->location.setX(locationx);
00267                         temp->location.setY(locationy);
00268                         temp->obstacle_cost = obstacle_cost;
00269                         temp->parent = NULL; 
00270                         temp->next   = searchSpace;
00271                         temp->type     = type;
00272                         searchSpace = temp;
00273                 }
00274         }
00275         fclose(file);
00276         return true;
00277 }
00279 bool PathPlanner::saveSpace2File(const char *filename)
00280 {
00281         assert(filename != NULL);
00282         filename = strdup(filename);
00283         FILE *file = fopen(filename, "wb");
00284         if (!file)
00285         {
00286                 printf("Error Opening File");fflush(stdout);
00287         fclose(file);
00288         return false;
00289         }
00290         SearchSpaceNode *temp=searchSpace;
00291         while (temp)
00292         {
00293                 fprintf(file,"%f %f %f %d\n",temp->location.x(),temp->location.y(),temp->obstacle_cost,temp->type);
00294                 temp = temp->next;
00295         }
00296         fclose(file);
00297         return true;
00298 }
00300 void PathPlanner::generateRegularGrid()
00301 {
00302         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00303         if(!mapInitialized)
00304         {
00305                 printf("\n      --->>> You have to read the map First <<<---    ");fflush(stdout);
00306                 return;
00307         }
00308         Point p;
00309         for(int i=0; i<this->map->getWidth(); i++)
00310         {
00311                 for(int j=0;j<this->map->getHeight();j++)
00312                 {
00313                         if (!this->map->grid[i][j]) //Free Pixel
00314                         {
00315                                 if (searchSpace == NULL ) // Constructing the ROOT NODE
00316                                 {
00317                                         temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00318                                         temp->location.setX(i);
00319                                         temp->location.setY(j);
00320                                         map->convertPix(&temp->location);
00321                                         temp->parent   = NULL;
00322                                         temp->next     = NULL;
00323                                         temp->type     = RegGridNode;
00324                                         searchSpace = temp;
00325                                 }
00326                                 else
00327                                 {
00328                                         p.setX(i);
00329                                         p.setY(j);
00330                                         map->convertPix(&p);
00331                                         if (checkShortestDistance(p.x(),p.y(),regGridDist))
00332                                         {
00333                                                 temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00334                                                 temp->location.setX(p.x());
00335                                                 temp->location.setY(p.y());
00336                                                 temp->parent = NULL; 
00337                                                 temp->next   = searchSpace;
00338                                                 temp->type     = RegGridNode;                                           
00339                                                 searchSpace = temp;
00340                                         }
00341                                 }
00342                         }
00343                 }
00344         }
00345         printf("\n      --->>> REGULAR GRID GENERATED SUCCESSFULLY <<<---       ");fflush(stdout);
00346 };
00348 void PathPlanner::bridgeTest()
00349 {
00350         int radius,pixels_per_bridge;
00351         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00352         Point p;
00353         double x,y,x2,y2;
00354         
00355 //      pixels_per_bridge = (int) (robot->robotLength/map->getMapRes());
00356 //      radius = (int) (robot->robotLength/(map->getMapRes()*2.0));
00357 
00358         pixels_per_bridge = (int) (bridge_length/map->getMapRes());
00359         radius = (int) (bridge_length/(map->getMapRes()*2.0));
00360 
00361         for(int i=0; i < this->map->getWidth() - pixels_per_bridge; i++)
00362                 {
00363                 for(int j=0;j<this->map->getHeight() - pixels_per_bridge ;j++)
00364                         {
00365                         int ab=0;
00366                                 for( x = (i - radius) ; x < (i + radius) ; x+=(radius/4.0))//x+=(radius))
00367                                 {
00368                                         // The circle is of Center (i,j) and radius R=radius
00369                                         ab++;
00370                                         if (x < 0) x = 0;
00371                                         if (x > this->map->getWidth()) break;                                           
00372                                         y = (int)(+ sqrt(radius*radius -  ( x - i)*( x - i)) + j);
00373                                         if (y < 0) y = 0;
00374                                         if (y >= this->map->getHeight()) y = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00375 
00376                                         x2 = i + (i - x);
00377                                         if (x2 < 0) x2 = 0;
00378                                         if (x2 > this->map->getWidth()) break;  
00379                                         y2 = (int)(- sqrt(radius*radius - (x2 - i)*(x2 - i)) + j);
00380                                         if (y2 < 0) y2 = 0;
00381                                         if (y2 >= this->map->getHeight()) y2 = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00382                                         //cout<<"\n x="<<x<<" y="<<y<<" x2="<<x2<<" y2="<<y2<<" i="<<i<<" j="<<j<<" R="<<radius;
00383                                         //fflush(stdout);
00384                                         if (!this->map->grid[i][j]&&this->map->grid[(int)x][(int)y]&&this->map->grid[(int)x2][(int)y2])
00385                                         {
00386                                                 p.setX(i);
00387                                                 p.setY(j);
00388                                                 map->convertPix(&p);
00389                                                 if (searchSpace == NULL ) // Constructing the ROOT NODE
00390                                                 {
00391                                                         temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00392                                                         temp->location.setX(p.x());
00393                                                         temp->location.setY(p.y());
00394                                                         temp->parent   = NULL;
00395                                                         temp->next     = NULL;
00396                                                         temp->type     = BridgeNode;                                                    
00397                                                         searchSpace = temp;
00398                                                 }
00399                                                 else
00400                                                 {
00401                                                         if (checkShortestDistance(p.x(),p.y(),bridge_res))
00402                                                         {
00403                                                                 temp = new SearchSpaceNode;
00404                                                                 temp->location.setX(p.x());
00405                                                                 temp->location.setY(p.y());
00406                                                                 temp->parent = NULL;
00407                                                                 temp->next   = searchSpace;
00408                                                                 temp->type     = BridgeNode;                                                                    
00409                                                                 searchSpace = temp;
00410                                                         }
00411                                                 }
00412                                         }
00413                                 }
00414                         //cout<<"\n I have iterated = "<<ab;
00415                         //fflush(stdout);
00416                         }
00417                 }
00418         printf("\n      --->>> BRIDGE TEST FINISHED SUCCESSFULLY <<<---");fflush(stdout);
00419 };
00421 void PathPlanner :: printNodeList()
00422 {
00423         int step=1;
00424         Point  pixel;
00425         Node *p;
00426         if(!(p = this->path))
00427                 return ;
00428         printf("\n  --------------------   START OF LIST ----------------------");fflush(stdout);
00429         while(p !=NULL)
00430         {
00431                 pixel =  p->pose.p;
00432                 cout <<"\nStep [" << step++ <<"] x["<< pixel.x()<<"]y["<<pixel.y()<<"]"<<" Direction="<<p->direction; fflush(stdout);
00433                 cout <<"\tG cost="<<p->g_value<<"\tH cost="<<p->h_value<<"\tFcost="<<p->f_value;fflush(stdout);
00434                 //cout<<"\tStored Angle = "<< setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(2)<<RTOD(p->angle);
00435                 if (p->next !=NULL)
00436                 {
00437                         //cout<<"\tNext Angle = "<< setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(2)<<RTOD(atan2(p->next->location.y - p->location.y, p->next->location.x - p->location.x));
00438                         //cout<<"\tAngle Diff ="<< setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(2)<<RTOD(anglediff(p->angle,atan2(p->next->location.y - p->location.y, p->next->location.x - p->location.x)));
00439                 }
00440                 p = p->next;
00441         }
00442         printf("\n --------------------   END OF LIST ---------------------- ");fflush(stdout);
00443 }
00445 void PathPlanner::addCostToNodes()
00446 {
00447         SearchSpaceNode * S;
00448         Point  point;
00449         double number_of_pixels,radius,nearest_obstacle;
00450         int i,j;
00451         //int n=0;
00452         if (!searchSpace) // Do nothing if Search Space is not Yet Created
00453                 return;
00454         S = searchSpace;
00455         number_of_pixels = obst_dist / map->getMapRes();
00456         while (S!=NULL)
00457         {
00458                 //cout<<"\n Node= "<<++n;
00459                 //fflush(stdout);
00460                 point.setX(S->location.x());
00461                 point.setY(S->location.y());
00462                 map->convert2Pix(&point);
00463                 nearest_obstacle = 0;
00464                 for(radius = (int)number_of_pixels ; radius >0 ; radius --)
00465                         {
00466                                 for( i= (int)(point.x() - radius) ; i < (int)(point.x() + radius); i+=1)
00467                                         {
00468                                                 if (i < 0) i = 0;
00469                                                 if (i >= this->map->getWidth())  break;
00470                                                 j = (int)(- sqrt(radius*radius - (i - point.x())*(i - point.x())) + point.y());
00471                                                 if (j < 0) j = 0;
00472                                                 if (j >= this->map->getHeight()) j = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00473                                                 if(this->map->grid[i][j])
00474                                                                  nearest_obstacle = radius;
00475                                                 j = (int)(+ sqrt(radius*radius - (i - point.x())*(i - point.x())) + point.y());
00476                                                 if (j < 0) j = 0;
00477                                                 if (j >= this->map->getHeight()) j = this->map->getHeight() - 1;
00478         
00479                                                 if(this->map->grid[i][j])
00480                                                                  nearest_obstacle = radius;
00481                                         }
00482                         }
00483                 // this is a normalized cost, it will make more sense later on 
00484                 S->obstacle_cost =  (obst_dist - nearest_obstacle*map->getMapRes())/obst_dist; 
00485                 S = S->next;
00486         }
00487         printf("\n      --->>> Penalty Added <<<---     ");fflush(stdout);
00488 };
00490 void PathPlanner::connectNodes()
00491 {
00492         SearchSpaceNode * S;
00493         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00494         double distance,angle;
00495         // Do nothing if Search Space is not Yet Created
00496         if (!searchSpace) 
00497                 return;
00498         temp = searchSpace;
00499         //      cout<<"\n RegGrid Conn:"<<reg_grid_conn_rad<<" Bridge Conn:"<<bridge_conn_rad;
00500         while (temp!=NULL)
00501         {
00502                 S = searchSpace;
00503                 while (S!=NULL)
00504                 {
00505                         distance = Dist(S->location,temp->location);
00506                         double testDist;
00507                         if(!(S->type==RegGridNode && temp->type==RegGridNode))
00508                         {
00509                                 testDist = bridge_conn_rad;
00510                         }
00511                         else
00512                         {
00513                                 testDist = reg_grid_conn_rad;
00514                         }
00515                         
00516                         if (distance <= testDist && distance !=0)
00517                         {
00518                                 angle = atan2(S->location.y() - temp->location.y() ,S->location.x() - temp->location.x());
00519                                 if(!inObstacle(temp->location,angle) && !inObstacle(S->location,angle))
00520                                 {
00521                                         temp->children.push_back(S);
00522                                 }
00523                         }
00524                         S = S->next;
00525                 }
00526                 temp = temp->next;
00527         }
00528         printf("\n      --->>> NODES CONNECTED <<<---   ");fflush(stdout);
00529 };
00531 bool PathPlanner::checkShortestDistance(double x,double y,double neigbhour_distance)
00532 {
00533         SearchSpaceNode * S;
00534         double distance,shortest_distance = 10000000;
00535 
00536         S = searchSpace;
00537         while (S!=NULL)
00538         {
00539                 distance = sqrt(pow(S->location.x() - x,2)+pow(S->location.y() - y,2));
00540                 if (distance <= shortest_distance)
00541                         shortest_distance = distance;
00542                 S = S->next;
00543         }
00544         if( shortest_distance > neigbhour_distance )
00545                 return 1;
00546         else
00547                 return 0;
00548 };
00550 void PathPlanner::showConnections()
00551 {
00552         Point loc1,loc2;
00553         SearchSpaceNode *temp = searchSpace;
00554         int m=0,n=0;
00555         while (temp != NULL)
00556         {
00557                 for(unsigned int i=0; i < temp->children.size();i++)
00558                 {
00559                         loc1 = temp->location;
00560                         map->convert2Pix(&loc1);
00561                         map->drawPixel(1,0,0,(int)loc1.x(),(int)loc1.y());
00562                         loc2 = temp->children[i]->location;
00563                         map->convert2Pix(&loc2);
00564                         m++;
00565                 }
00566                 temp = temp->next;
00567                 n++;
00568         }
00569         printf("\n---->>> TOTAL NUMBER OF CONNECTIONS =%d\n---->>> Total Nodes in search Space =%d",m,n);fflush(stdout);
00570 }
00572 void PathPlanner::saveSearchSpace()
00573 {
00574         Point p;
00575         SearchSpaceNode *temp = searchSpace;
00576         while (temp != NULL)
00577         {
00578                 p = temp->location;
00579                 map->convert2Pix(&p);
00580                 this->map->grid[int(p.x())][(int)p.y()]= true ;
00581                 temp =temp->next;
00582         }
00583 }
00585 bool PathPlanner::fileExist(const char * fname)
00586 {
00587         struct stat stat_buf;
00588         if (stat(fname,&stat_buf) != 0)
00589                 return false;
00590         return (stat_buf.st_mode & S_IFMT) == S_IFREG;
00591 }
00593 
00598 void PathPlanner::generateSpace()
00599 {
00600         Timer timer;
00601         const char * filename = "SearchSpace.txt";
00602         if(this->searchSpace)
00603         {
00604                 //pathPlanner->FreeSearchSpace();               
00605                 return;
00606         }               
00607         timer.restart();
00608         if(fileExist(filename))
00609         {
00610                 printf("\nLoading Space From file ..."); fflush(stdout);
00611                 this->readSpaceFromFile(filename);
00612                 if(expObstEnabled)
00613                         this->expandObstacles();
00614                 this->connectNodes();   
00615                 printf("\nFile loading took:%f sec",timer.secElapsed());fflush(stdout);
00616         }
00617         else
00618         {
00619                 printf("\nGenerating Space ...");               fflush(stdout);
00620                 if(expObstEnabled)
00621                         this->expandObstacles();
00622                 if(regGridEnabled)
00623                         this->generateRegularGrid();
00624                 if(bridgeTestEnabled)
00625                         this->bridgeTest();
00626                 if(obstPenEnabled)
00627                         this->addCostToNodes();
00628                 this->connectNodes();
00629                 this->saveSpace2File(filename);
00630                 printf("\nSpace Generation took:%f sec",timer.secElapsed());    fflush(stdout); 
00631         }
00632         this->renderTree = true;
00633         this->showConnections();
00634 }
00636 Node* PathPlanner::findPath(Pose start, Pose end,int coord)
00637 {
00638         this->start = start;
00639         this->end = end;
00640         return findPath(coord);
00641 }
00643 Node * PathPlanner::findPath(int coord)
00644 {
00645         Node * retval;
00646         if(!this->searchSpace)
00647         {
00648                 generateSpace();
00649         }
00650 
00651         retval = this->startSearch(start,end,coord);            
00652 
00653         if(retval)
00654         {
00655                 this->printNodeList();
00656         }
00657         else
00658         {
00659                 printf("\nNo Path Found");fflush(stdout);
00660         }
00661         return retval;
00662 }
00666 void PathPlanner :: setMap(Map * map_in)
00667 {
00668 //      printf("SETTING MAP"); fflush(stdout);
00669         if(!map_in)
00670         {
00671                 printf("\nWhy the hell ur giving me an empty map ???");fflush(stdout);
00672                 fflush(stdout);
00673                 return;
00674         }
00675         if(!map_in->grid)
00676         {
00677                 printf("\nWhy the hell ur giving me an empty map data ???");fflush(stdout);
00678                 fflush(stdout);
00679                 return;         
00680         }
00681         this->map = map_in;
00682         MAXNODES = MaxLong;
00683 //      printf("W_in:%d H_in:%d",map->getWidth(),map->getHeight());
00684         mapInitialized = true;  
00685 //      printf("MAP SET"); fflush(stdout);      
00686 };
00688 void PathPlanner::drawPath()
00689 {
00690         if (!path)
00691         {
00692                 printf("\n->NO Path Generated Yet, plan a Path First");
00693                 return;
00694         }
00695 
00696         Point l_start,l_end;
00697         Node *p;
00698         p = path;
00699         while(p != NULL)
00700         {
00701                 l_start =  p->pose.p;
00702                 map->convert2Pix(&l_start);
00703                 map->drawPixel(0,0,1,(int)l_start.x(),(int)l_start.y());
00704                 p = p->next;
00705         }
00706         map->savePixelBuffer("_path.png");
00707 }
00709 void PathPlanner::drawSearchSpace()
00710 {
00711         Point loc;
00712         SearchSpaceNode *temp = searchSpace;
00713         while (temp != NULL)
00714         {
00715                 for(unsigned int i=0; i < temp->children.size();i++)
00716                 {
00717                         loc = temp->location;
00718                         map->convert2Pix(&loc);
00719                         map->drawPixel(1,0,0,(int)loc.x(),(int)loc.y());
00720                 }
00721                 temp = temp->next;
00722         }
00723         map->savePixelBuffer("_searchSpace.png");       
00724 }
00725 
00726 }
